title: Educate Girls Around The World: Good People Doing Good Work
description: 62 million girls are not in school around the world.Educate Girls Around the World celebrates the progress being made in the global movement for girls’ education. Millions more are fighting for the right to stay in school.Educate Girls Around the World provides a profile of the organizations that are making a difference in the field of global education - especially for girls. The author shows us how education positively impacts a number of major issues that girls and women face in the developing world.Girls are being educated at greater numbers than ever before - but there is still work to be done. Educate Girls Around the World points out the challenges and opportunities in girls’ education around the world.Become part of the movement.
author: Shay Spivey
